name: 2048-up-right
tagline: implementation of the up-right algorithm discussed in http://asherv.com/threes/threemails/#letter
body:
# 2048 up-right script
This script is the implementation of the algorithm mentioned by three's creators [here](http://asherv.com/threes/threemails/#letter). After running script approximately 20 times, my highest score is **3620**. Usually you wont get a score below 1300.

[2048 - up-right](https://github.com/Dudemullet/2048-up-right)

## Purpose
The purpose isn't to "stick it to" 2048's creator @gabrielecirulli. I respect her work. I had just never created a bookmarklet before and saw that this script was yet to be created so I took a shot at it.

### Support, Contact or contributions
https://github.com/Dudemullet/2048-up-right
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
